Package com.attivio.util

Class XStreamSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.util.XStreamSerializer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XMLSerializer
    public abstract class XStreamSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Serializes/deserializes XML using XStream.
    See Also:
    XStream

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected static class  XStreamSerializer.AttivioDefaultConverter
      Converter that will throw an exception if anyone tries to convert an Attivio model object.
      protected static class  XStreamSerializer.NonCachingStringConverter
      The non-caching string converter.
